message: I look up to find a familiar duo standing in front of me.

name: ウイルス
message: "Hey."

name: トリップ
message: "Hey there."

name: ウイルス
message: "What's the matter? Feeling sick?"

name: トリップ
message: "Crowd gettin' to you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You two..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, must be the crowd."
The four-eyes is Virus. The big guy is Trip. I've known them for ages.

name: 蓮
message: "How are you feeling?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Not great, but I'll be fine."

name: ウイルス
message: "What're you doing here anyway? Thought Rhyme wasn't your thing."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Just passing through."

name: ウイルス
message: "You thinking of joining?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Not a chance."

name: トリップ
message: "So it's a coincidence you're here right when a fight starts?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm telling you I'm not interested. What about you? What're you two doing here?"

name: ウイルス
message: "We're here on business."

name: トリップ
message: "The Rhymers've been gettin' a little out of hand lately."
The Old Residential District is home to some pretty dangerous groups. These two belong to one of them.

I met them ages ago, when I was still a stupid teenager.

Back then, I was always pissed off about something. I'd spend my nights trolling for brawls in Wanibashi.
In the end, all that adolescent posturing got me was a trip to the hospital after I picked a fight with the wrong guy.
Yeah, I was kind of a loser...
The only people who really know what I got up to back then are these two and Granny.
I lost touch with them until we reconnected a few years ago.
By then, I'd gotten a part time job and they had joined the yakuza.
Considering that the police here are basically yakuza too, it's never really bothered me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Anyway, you two look the same as ever. Like twins."

name: ウイルス
message: "We're not twins."

name: ウイルス
message: "Things going well at work?"

name: トリップ
message: "The ice cream shop, right? With the penguin aprons? I thought you got fired on your first day."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I made it three days, thank you very much. Now I work at a junk shop."

name: トリップ
message: "Riiight, what was it again? Dumb-dumb?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hum-Drum Junk. I've been there for a while now."

name: ウイルス
message: "That name doesn't suit you. If you ever want to let loose again, you know who to call."

name: ウイルス
message: "We've got a lot of power. You could do worse."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Haha... Well, I appreciate the offer."

name: ウイルス
message: "I keep thinking how much I'd like to see you fight again."

name: トリップ
message: "Yeah. We're your biggest fans."

name: 卯水
message: "Oh! 250 damage to Route 44! Is it over already?!"

A roar goes up from the audience.
<?>
But then―

name: 悪島
message: "Hey, you hooligans!"
An even louder voice cuts through the charged atmosphere.
Brandishing a megaphone, a man charges in with several police officers in tow.

name: ウイルス
message: "Oh, just what we needed."

name: 悪島
message: "Where do you fuckers think you are?! YOU'RE ALL UNDER ARREEEEEST!!!"
The match is over. Usui vanishes in a puff of smoke, and the fighters and spectators scatter.

The guy with the megaphone is Akushima, a hardass detective who's as crooked as they come.

He's jailed or beaten dozens of people on blatantly false charges.
They call him the Grim Reaper of the Old Residential District.

name: ウイルス
message: "I think we'd better be going. You probably should too."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: トリップ
message: "See ya round."

name: 悪島
message: "Wait, you scumbags! Get back here! We're gonna arrest every one of you shitheads!"
Akushima looks like he's about to burst a blood vessel. I ignore him and take off running.
